attributes.action: Re introduce Military service: Army, Navy, RAF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that Military service should be re introduced for a period of at least 1 year for all those who become 18 years old.

We feel this would create life skills and possible careers and focus for the youth

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
